title: Sr. Product Designer (UX DESIGN)
description: Mô tả công việc
Product Designer (UX) will be responsible for creating user-friendly and impactful designs for online products of VUS. The jobs requirement are as follows:
(UX)

Closely work and discuss the project with the product team to fully explore and understand the user problem statements and business objectives.
Closely collaborate with product managers and owners, other internal stakeholders, and engineering team at every stage in the product development process to ensure the implementation fully represents your work.
Actively and continuously conduct customer discovery activities including but not limited to observation, user interview, usability testing, focus group and other product validation process to gain deeper understanding and insights into VUS target customers. 
Work on wireframes, storyboards, and sitemaps to create user-friendly and straightforward ideas for products.
Proactively get yourself updated and exposed to the design industry for best practices in user experience and designing.
Ongoing manage and enhance the team’s design system documentation and processes.
Closely work and discuss the project with the product team to fully explore and understand the user problem statements and business objectives.

Closely collaborate with product managers and owners, other internal stakeholders, and engineering team at every stage in the product development process to ensure the implementation fully represents your work.

Actively and continuously conduct customer discovery activities including but not limited to observation, user interview, usability testing, focus group and other product validation process to gain deeper understanding and insights into VUS target customers.
Work on wireframes, storyboards, and sitemaps to create user-friendly and straightforward ideas for products.
Proactively get yourself updated and exposed to the design industry for best practices in user experience and designing.
Ongoing manage and enhance the team’s design system documentation and processes.
yc: Yêu cầu công việc

At least 05 years of experience in UX DESIGN for mobile apps (preferred) with proven track record in shipping appealing and user-friendly digital products to end users.
Portfolios of your own design and project deliverables are MUST-HAVE.
Solid knowledge of UX, design principles and methodologies to deeply learn and validate user behaviors through effective and practical tests and experiments. 
Strong ability to produce UX development plans including persona development, customer journeys, design guidelines, wireframing, concept and product usability testing, etc.
Proficiency in a dozen digital design tools (e.g: Figma, Sketch, Adobe Suite, Axure, or related prototyping softwares) and delivering pixel perfect designs.
Effectively articulate design ideas and reasoning with customer-focused data insights. 
Degree in Creative Arts and Design; Graphic and Digital Design, or other related fields. 
Having experience or being familiar with digital products/apps in education or edutainment before is a big PLUS.
At least 05 years of experience in UX DESIGN for mobile apps (preferred) with proven track record in shipping appealing and user-friendly digital products to end users.

title: Senior UX Designer/Web Designer
linh_vuc: Thuê Ngoài Phát Triển Phần Mềm
description: Mô tả công việc

We are seeking a highly talented and experienced Senior UX Designer/Web Designer to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in web design, with a keen eye for detail and a passion for creating visually appealing and user-friendly designs.

We are seeking a highly talented and experienced Senior UX Designer/Web Designer to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in web design, with a keen eye for detail and a passion for creating visually appealing and user-friendly designs.
Senior UX Designer/Web Designer

If you have a refined visual aesthetic, strong communication skills, a can-do attitude, and are looking for a high-energy environment that celebrates design thinking and the customer experience — consider joining our team!

If you have a refined visual aesthetic, strong communication skills, a can-do attitude, and are looking for a high-energy environment that celebrates design thinking and the customer experience — consider joining our team!
JOB DESCRIPTIONS
JOB DESCRIPTIONS
JOB DESCRIPTIONS

Design and optimize web pages, landing pages, and email templates with a focus on user experience (UX) and conversion rate optimization (CRO).
Work closely with the UX and web development team to ensure designs are implemented accurately and effectively.
Conduct usability testing and gather user feedback to improve and refine web designs.
Collaborate with the marketing team to create engaging and on-brand marketing materials.
Ensure all designs adhere to brand guidelines and maintain consistency across all platforms.
Manage and maintain a library of design assets and resources.
Stay up-to-date with the latest web design trends, tools, and technologies.
Lead and manage multiple design projects simultaneously, ensuring timely delivery and high-quality outcomes.
Communicate effectively with stakeholders to gather requirements, provide updates, and incorporate feedback.
Ensure every design produced, whether it’s a banner or new website template, delivers an effective experience across desktop, mobile and tablet

Experience in eCommerce
​​At least 3 year-experience in designing for both Web & Mobile app
Experience of responsive and mobile design
Proficiency in design tools/software such as Figma, Sketch, Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign).
Strong portfolio showcasing a range of design projects.
Excellent understanding of UX/UI principles and best practices.
Knowledge of HTML5, CSS3, and basic JavaScript is a plus.
Strong communication, organizational, and time-management skills.
Problem-solving aptitude
Ability to work independently as well as collaboratively in a team environment.

title: Senior UI UX Designer
description: Mô tả công việc

Collect and evaluate user requirements with the help of product managers and engineers.
Use storyboards, process flows, and sitemaps to illustrate design concepts.
Menus, tabs, and widgets are examples of graphic user interface elements.
Make page navigation buttons and search fields.
Create UI mockups and prototypes that clearly show how sites work and look.
Make unique graphic designs. 
Rough draughts should be prepared and presented to internal teams and key stakeholders.
Identify and resolve UX issues.
Make layout changes based on user feedback. Follow font, color, and image style guidelines.

Strong portfolio showcasing previous design projects.
Proficiency in wireframe tools such as Figma, Wireframe.cc and InVision.
Up-to-date knowledge of design software, including Adobe Illustrator and Photoshop.

Good time-management skills to meet project deadlines.
Bachelor's degree (BSc) in Design, Computer Science, or a relevant field.

Mô tả công việc

title: Product Designer (UX/UI)
description: Mô tả công việc
Role Description
Role Description
Role Description

BioTuring is seeking a passionate and talented Product Designer to join our growing team, and leading the design of our bioinformatics platform, creating intuitive interfaces for complex scientific data.

BioTuring is seeking a passionate and talented Product Designer to join our growing team, and leading the design of our bioinformatics platform, creating intuitive interfaces for complex scientific data.
Key Responsibilities
Key Responsibilities
Key Responsibilities

Lead the design process for all features and functionalities within the BioTuring platform and ecosystem.
Develop high-fidelity mockups, prototypes, and user interface (UI) design elements.
Create and maintain detailed flowcharts and user journey maps to document design decisions and user interactions.
Manage project timelines and milestones effectively to ensure on-time product releases.
Champion user research and advocate for a data-driven design approach.
Participate in product strategy discussions and provide design expertise.
Stay up-to-date on the latest trends and best practices in user interface (UI) and user experience (UX) design.

3+ years of experience in product design, with a focus on complex platforms, enterprise software, or visual product development.
A plus is a background in Biology or a related field to understand the scientific context of our platform.
Strong understanding of design principles, including user experience (UX) research, interaction design, and visual design.
Proven ability to create user-centered designs that are both aesthetically pleasing and functional.

title: UX Designer (UI-UX, Figma, Illustrator)
description: Mô tả công việc

Chịu trách nhiệm trực tiếp đối với thiết kế, trải nghiệm khác hàng trong các dự án được giao
Xây dựng và cải tiến quy trình thiết kế, phân tích trải nghiệm người dùng
Am hiểu các lĩnh vực sản phẩm của Ngân hàng, phát triển và cải tiến giao diện, trải nghiệm cho khách hàng theo định hướng kinh doanh từng thời kỳ.
Xây dựng Design system/Product map/Trải nghiệm khách hàng
Tham gia xây dựng Design system, components, Mobile app, web app của ABBank.
Tham gia xây dựng mô hình hoạt động phục vụ dự án và khối sản phẩm.
Chịu trách nhiệm trong việc thiết kế, đánh giá trải nghiệm khách hàng hiện tại và tương lai và đưa ra các phương án cải thiện, nâng cấp.
Đánh giá, cải tiến quy trình thiết kế/quy định/sản phẩm nhằm nâng cao hiệu quả công việc và chất lượng sản phẩm.
Đo lường hiệu quả và rà soát chất lượng, tiến độ dự án, đề xuất các hành động thay đổi cần thiết để nâng cao hiệu quả làm việc, chất lượng sản phẩm.

title: UI/UX Designer (Fresher/Junior)
company_model: Dịch vụ và Tư vấn giải pháp
linh_vuc: Dịch Vụ và Tư Vấn IT
description: Mô tả công việc
About Us

Founded in November 2021, AgileOps has quickly become the official partner of major technology companies like Atlassian, Google, and HubSpot in Vietnam within just 2 years. AgileOps distributes products and offers consulting, training, implementation, and IT infrastructure management services for world-renowned software companies, including:

Atlassian: Project management software suite, team collaboration tools, IT service management, and knowledge sharing, including Jira, Confluence, and Jira Service Management.
Google: Office applications, email software, cloud storage services, and online meeting tools.
HubSpot: Marketing automation and customer relationship management (CRM) software suite.
Atlassian: Project management software suite, team collaboration tools, IT service management, and knowledge sharing, including Jira, Confluence, and Jira Service Management.
Atlassian
Google: Office applications, email software, cloud storage services, and online meeting tools.
Google
HubSpot: Marketing automation and customer relationship management (CRM) software suite.
HubSpot

We are seeking an enthusiastic UI/UX Designer (Fresher/Junior) for a full-time role. If you possess UI/UX design experience, skills and look to utilize these qualities to drive success for a quickly growing IT service company, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity.
UI/UX Designer (Fresher/Junior)
UI/UX Designer (Fresher/Junior)
What You Will Do

As a UI/UX Designer (Fresher/Junior), your role will involve implementing and upkeeping the visual elements of our front-end. This encompasses collaborating with marketers and developers to craft wireframes, mockups, and visually captivating user interfaces.
UI/UX Designer (Fresher/Junior)
Responsibilities include:

Designing the user interface (UI) of products and services, focusing on both the visual appearance and the functionality of the UI.
Collaborating with engineers to understand product and service requirements, including user needs and technical constraints.
Creating wireframes, mockups, and prototypes to effectively communicate design ideas to stakeholders.
Designing and creating visual diagrams and/or infographics to simplify and explain complex content.
Designing the user interface (UI) of products and services, focusing on both the visual appearance and the functionality of the UI.
Designing the user interface (UI) of products and services
Collaborating with engineers to understand product and service requirements, including user needs and technical constraints.
Collaborating with engineers
Creating wireframes, mockups, and prototypes to effectively communicate design ideas to stakeholders.
Creating wireframes, mockups, and prototypes
Designing and creating visual diagrams and/or infographics to simplify and explain complex content.
Designing and creating visual diagrams and/or infographics
Don't worry about the long list; our Art Director – Ngoc Vu (myup.work/ngocvltb) will guide you through every step you're unfamiliar with.
myup.work/ngocvltb

Holidays Bonus – Extra pay for every public holiday.
Birthday Bonus – Extra pay for your special day.
Incentive Bonus – Extra bonus based on your performance and generated revenue.
Overtime Bonus – Get compensated when you clock more than 160 hours monthly.
Certification Bonus – Get paid for self-learning and passing every significant professional certification on, … 
Annual Bonus – 13th-month salary (sometimes 14th) based on your performance

title: Senior UI/UX Designer
company_model: Dịch vụ và Tư vấn giải pháp
linh_vuc: Dịch Vụ và Tư Vấn IT
description: Mô tả công việc

Lead the translation of complex concepts into intuitive user flows, customer journey maps, wireframes, mockups, and interactive prototypes that work seamlessly across a wide range of devices and interfaces;
Take a user-centered design approach and iterate rapidly based on feedback, user testing and data analytics.
Identify and solve design problems with creative and effective solutions;
Make strategic design and user experience decisions that enhance both existing and new features and functionalities;
Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, including product managers, developers, and stakeholders, to ensure a cohesive design vision.
yc: Yêu cầu công việc
4+ years of experience in product design, with a strong portfolio showcasing complex digital product designs and eCommerce platforms;
Expertise in design software such as Figma, Sketch, Adobe XD, and prototyping tools. Basic knowledge of HTML, CSS3, and JavaScript is a plus;
Proven ability to work with clients to gather requirements, articulate user needs, and design complete user experiences that align with client goals and visions;
Strong experience in responsive design, design system, and deep knowledge of UX best practices and accessibility standards;
Proficiency in user-centered design methodologies, design thinking, user research, usability testing, A/B testing, and rapid prototyping;
Strong communication skills, logical thinking and critical thinking to clearly articulate design processes, ideas, and solutions to both internal teams and clients;
Ability to collaborate effectively within a multidisciplinary team and translate abstract concepts into practical design solutions;
Open to feedback, with a proactive attitude toward constructive criticism and continuous learning;
Passion for UX, design innovation, and staying up-to-date with the latest industry trends and technologies.
address: 14th Floor, CLand Tower, 156 Xa Dan II, Dong Da, Ha Noi

title: Motion Graphics Designer - HCM

The Role:
The Role:

We are looking for a Motion Graphics Designer to join our dynamic and rapidly growing marketing team in Vietnam. In this role, you will work closely with our creative team to create engaging animations, videos and graphics that promote our Company brand and solutions across multiple channels. We are looking for a skilful storyteller, creative thinker and strong collaborator to showcase our innovative and market-leading products and industry differentiation.

Work closely with the business development team of the regions to ensure the optimal presentation of the Company’s brand
Conceptualise, create storyboards, design/illustrate and develop motion graphics and animations for advertising, educational and platform videos for web, mobile, and other digital platforms
Build relationships and collaborate with cross functional department to bring engaging narratives to life through motion design projects
Edit and optimize video content for a variety of social platforms
Work with voice-overs and sound effects to enhance video productions
Edit video footage and motion graphics composition
Perform any other related tasks as assigned by the Business Development Marketing Manager

title: Senior UI/UX Designer - Web / Mobile App / Product
company_model: Dịch vụ và Tư vấn giải pháp
linh_vuc: Thuê Ngoài Phát Triển Phần Mềm
description: Mô tả công việc
Agile Lab is looking to enhance our service offerings and improve internal processes.

We are looking for candidates with deep expertise in User Experience and User Interface design work for both web and mobile applications. UI/UX Designers responsibilities include gathering user requirements, designing graphic elements and building navigation components. To be successful in this role, you should have experience with design software and wireframe tools. We believe that you also have a portfolio of professional design projects that includes work with mobile applications that is ready to be discussed on the interview.
There is ample opportunity to grow and learn with the deeply motivated team at Agile lab Pte Ltd.
Responsibilities:
Responsibilities:

Gather and evaluate user requirements in collaboration with product managers and developers to ensure accurate implementation of design specifications.
Develop wireframes, prototypes, and interactive mockups to illustrate how the app function and look like.
Design system-wise components (interface elements, like menus, tabs…).
Prepare and present rough drafts to internal teams and key stakeholders.
Plan and conduct cross functional product strategy and implement to facilitate UX creation and ensure design output.
Ensure consistent and intuitive user experiences across multiple devices and platforms.
Identify and troubleshoot UX problems and conduct adjustments based on user feedback.
Create original graphic designs (e.g images, sketches and tables).
Stay updated with the latest design trends, tools, and technologies to continuously improve design processes.

description: Mô tả công việc

Tổng Công ty Mạng lưới Viettel (Viettel Networks - VTNet) là đơn vị trực thuộc Tập đoàn Công nghiệp - Viễn thông Quân đội (Viettel), đứng đầu Tập đoàn về mức độ trưởng thành số, chịu trách nhiệm quy hoạch, thiết kế, Vận hành khai thác toàn bộ mạng lưới Công nghệ thông tin và hạ tầng viễn thông của Viettel tại Việt Nam và các thị trường nước ngoài do Viettel đầu tư.

Phối hợp với các nhóm liên quan (PO, PM, Dev…) để thiết kế các giải pháp cho các vấn đề phức tạp, nghiên cứu và áp dụng các phương pháp lấy người dùng làm trung tâm (User centered) để hoàn thiện sản phẩm product của trung tâm.
Theo dõi và cải tiến quy trình thiết kế, nâng cấp Design system, Style guide của các sản phẩm trong Công ty.
Thiết kế UI/UX cho các product của công ty trên đa thiết bị: Mobile app, Tablet và Website.
Thiết kế giải pháp, tinh chỉnh các giao diện người dùng theo yêu cầu của nhóm phát triển.

description: Mô tả công việc

Tham gia từ giai đoạn thiết kế đến triển khai sản phẩm của siêu dự án phát triển phần mềm CAD cho khách hàng Nhật Bản. Dự án phần mềm kiến trúc, xây dựng cho khách hàng Nhật Bản là dự án lớn của tập đoàn DTS Japan (top 10 tập đoàn CNTT tại Nhật Bản), với nhiều modules phần mềm khác nhau, từ Windows App, Web App, iOS App… 
Phát triển Plugin cho revit và các ứng dụng CAD khác theo đơn đặt hàng của khách hàng Nhật
Được đào tạo: chuyên sâu về C#, C/C++ và các kiến thức, kỹ năng cần thiết cho phát triển các sản phẩm cho CAD
Làm việc trong môi trường chuyên nghiệp, tuân thủ quy trình phát triển phần mềm chuẩn PMS của DTS Japan
Hợp tác làm việc với các Leaders, Project Manager xuất sắc với hàng chục năm kinh nghiệm tại các công ty phần mềm lớn nhất ở Nhật Bản và Việt Nam với các quy trình quản lý dự án bài bản, chuyên nghiệp.

yc: Yêu cầu công việc

Ứng viên có từ 6 tháng đến dưới 2 năm kinh nghiệm sử dụng ngôn ngữ C++, chấp nhận sinh viên mới ra trường, hoặc dự kiến tốt nghiệp trong năm 2024 - nửa đầu năm 2025 đã có kiến thức và kinh nghiệm về lập trình C++
Ứng viên có định hướng làm dự án phát triển phần mềm ứng dụng
Ưu tiên ứng viên có kiến thức về xử lý đồ họa 2D, 3D; có kinh nghiệm làm dự án liên quan đến phần mềm CAD, đồ họa
Ưu tiên ứng viên biết tiếng Nhật và đã có kinh nghiệm làm việc cho công ty/ dự án Nhật.

title: Senior QA/QC Test Engineer/Designer (Japanese N2+)
linh_vuc: Dịch Vụ và Tư Vấn IT
description: Mô tả công việc
The Opportunity
The Opportunity

As our business continues to grow, we are looking for Japanese Test Designer who can contribute to manual test case management, communicate with relating stakeholder and develop the application in cooperation with the product manager, working in the form of Squad, a small team can quickly and consistently engage in everything from design to development, testing and operation.
Job Scope
Job Scope

Performing test analysis, design and execution of web and mobile applications
Creating test reports
Having a high awareness of product quality, such as improving system requirement definition accuracy and improving UAT process, while creating and implementing under your own plan
By being involved in the early stages of a project, detecting and responding quickly to risk factors such as bugs and schedules.
Planning and implementing measures to prevent recurrence of problems
Performing test analysis, design and execution of web and mobile applications
Creating test reports

By being involved in the early stages of a project, detecting and responding quickly to risk factors such as bugs and schedules.
Planning and implementing measures to prevent recurrence of problems
Development environment
Development environment

Automation test: Autify
Backend: Ruby(on Rails), Go, Amazon Aurora(MySQL), Elasticsearch, DynamoDB
FrontEnd: Nuxt.js/Vue.js, ReactJS
Mobile App: Kotlin, Swift, Flutter
Deploy/ Build: CodePipeline, CodeBuild, CircleCI, GitHub Actions
Others: swagger, Docker, ZenHub, Figma

title: Senior Game Designer
description: Mô tả công việc

Design and develop game ideas from concept to release, ensuring creativity, entertainment value, and balance.
Build and develop gameplay mechanics, game systems, and user experiences aligned with product goals.
Collaborate closely with development teams (programmers, artists, QA, etc.) to ensure compatibility and completeness of the game.
Evaluate and adjust gameplay elements based on player feedback and data analysis.
Create and maintain game design documents (GDD), including detailed descriptions of features, levels, items, and characters.
Research and track market trends to continually enhance and update products to meet player preferences.
Assist in developing new concepts for future game projects.
Design and develop game ideas from concept to release, ensuring creativity, entertainment value, and balance.
Build and develop gameplay mechanics, game systems, and user experiences aligned with product goals.
Collaborate closely with development teams (programmers, artists, QA, etc.) to ensure compatibility and completeness of the game.
Evaluate and adjust gameplay elements based on player feedback and data analysis.
Create and maintain game design documents (GDD), including detailed descriptions of features, levels, items, and characters.
Research and track market trends to continually enhance and update products to meet player preferences.
Assist in developing new concepts for future game projects.
yc: Yêu cầu công việc

Minimum 3 years of experience as a Game Designer, preferably in mobile game development.
Proven experience in designing and developing puzzle games (match-3, logic puzzles, word puzzles, etc.). In-depth understanding of level structures, puzzle mechanics, and how to build difficulty progression.
Deep knowledge of various game genres, gaming trends, and player behavior.
Strong creative thinking, analytical, and problem-solving skills.
Excellent team collaboration skills, with the ability to communicate and present ideas effectively.
Proficiency with game design tools such as Unity, Unreal Engine, or equivalent software.
Basic understanding of programming and game AI systems is a plus.
Ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously, with strong time management skills and a track record of meeting deadlines.
Minimum 3 years of experience as a Game Designer, preferably in mobile game development.

title: Senior UI/UX Designer
linh_vuc: Thuê Ngoài Phát Triển Phần Mềm
description: Mô tả công việc

We are looking for a Senior UI/UX Designer based in Vietnam and collaborating with international clients is responsible for creating exceptional user experiences and interfaces that meet the needs of a global audience. This role involves a combination of creative design, user research, and collaboration with cross-functional teams to ensure the delivery of intuitive and user-centered solutions.

We are looking for a Senior UI/UX Designer based in Vietnam and collaborating with international clients is responsible for creating exceptional user experiences and interfaces that meet the needs of a global audience. This role involves a combination of creative design, user research, and collaboration with cross-functional teams to ensure the delivery of intuitive and user-centered solutions.
Responsibilities
Responsibilities
Responsibilities

Producing high-quality design solutions through wireframes, visual and graphic designs, flow diagrams, storyboards, site maps, and prototypes.
Interact, communicate and present ideas to the executive team.
Conceptualize creative ideas with stakeholders.
Conduct usability testing to validate design concepts.
Collaborate with the cross-functional team to turn concepts into visuals.
Work closely with the stakeholders and design team to initiate, execute, and extract insights using a variety of research methods: observational, interviews, participatory, usability testing, competitive analysis, etc.
Contribute to the design team patterns, the process, vision, etc.
Conduct design thinking and questioning techniques to develop strategies and execution plans where pathways are not always obvious.
Providing advice and guidance on the implementation of UX research methodologies and testing activities in order to analyze and predict user behavior.
Collaborating with the marketing team, and design team to ensure the creation and delivery of tailored experiences for the users.
Producing high-quality design solutions through wireframes, visual and graphic designs, flow diagrams, storyboards, site maps, and prototypes.

yc: Yêu cầu công việc

A bachelor's degree in Design or related fields
At least 5+ years of experience as a UI/UX Designer, strong portfolio demonstrating work on complex systems and a global mindset
Experience in designing for international markets, considering cultural and usability factors
Ability to brainstorm concepts quickly
Have knowledge of UX research experience applying various research methodologies and data analysis techniques.
Hands-on experience with design and collaboration tools: Figma (we’re using it mainly), Miro, Sketch, InVision, HTML, CSS (SCSS), iOS, Android, Design Systems, and Adobe Creative Suite.
A keen eye for detail and quality
A strong work ethic, open mind and commitment to self-improvement.
A team player but can work independently too.
Good written and verbal communication skills (both Vietnamese and English).
Multi-tasking and time-management skills, with the ability to prioritize tasks.
A portfolio of professional UI/UX design work for both web and mobile platforms.
